issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Improve Examples in documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11969](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11969). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be cool to have an example on the main README.md of datafusion (that appears on the crates.io homepage) that shows a prospective user what DataFusion offers. 

e.g look at how tokio does it https://crates.io/crates/tokio)

I plan to lift the nice example from https://docs.rs/datafusion/3.0.0/datafusion/ ?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11969?focusedCommentId=17307076) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9710
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9710>
